content:
I am getting a Jira Artifacts warning from the IG Publisher. The only difference it the ballotUrl attribute in the root element. This comes from the package-list.json. There was an old ballot version which still shows up in package-list with current = false. There is not an active ballot so it seems that should not go in to the Jira artifacts. Which should I do:

  1. Add the Feb 2020 ballotUrl back into the Jira Artifacts xml
  2. Remove or otherwise edit the package-list.json so it does not show up in the generated jira artifacts
  3. add an ignorewarinings with a comment as to the reason
  4. something else
